thread.title: Free BBQ charcoal from Homebase
thread.title_full: Free BBQ charcoal from Homebase - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Free BBQ charcoal from Homebase
text: The Telegraph has teamed up with Homebase to offer readers a free 4kg bag of charcoal barbecue briquettes worth £4.99. Use with Homebase’s fantastic range of charcoal barbecues to give your food a traditional, flame-grilled taste. Plus, you can also save £5 when you spend £20 or more on garden products at Homebase. Choose from outdoor furniture, well-known barbecue brands, quality garden tools, beautiful garden plants and pots, and essential maintenance items such as hoses and plant food. How to Claim: See the newspaper on Saturday, July 25, 2015 telegraph.co.uk Follow @telegraph
